name: Rolling (Antunes10)
description:
Rolling is a puzzle platform game, where we control a single ball, and try to complete small levels, with a fixed gameplay area, that would become increasingly difficult.

The main objective is to reach the portals with the right colour and progress to the next level, until we reach the end.

There is are several coins throughout the levels, which can be caught to achieve the maximum high score.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move

Space - Jump

Mini Map - M

Light Mode - P

God Mode - I
